snippet.title: Surgeon Simulator: Anniversary Edition - PlayStation 4 Trailer
snippet.description:
Subscribe for more: http://bit.ly/2dYhf3k

Malpractice makes perfect.

The critically acclaimed, BAFTA-nominated, one-handed, clumsy, bumbling, surgery simulation game has now arrived on PlayStation 4!  Players can use their controllers to operate one of would-be surgeon Nigel Burke’s flailing arms, in an attempt to perform life-saving surgery on his peaceful and trusting patient, Bob.

In the super-elite Anniversary Edition, Nigel’s surgical adventures will take him through over 20 operations and across 5 different locations, including the new eye and teeth transplants, corridors, ambulance and space. We’ve also added 56 trophies for you to collect, admire. Aren’t you lucky?

€10.99 / £8.99/$12.99

Talk to us!

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/SurgeonSim
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/OfficialSurgeonSimulator

Website: www.surgeonsim.com - sign up to our newsletter so you can be FIRST to hear about any new stuff we release. 

Starring the awesomeee:
Rooster Teeth - https://www.youtube.com/user/RoosterTeeth
NerdCubed - https://www.youtube.com/user/OfficialNerdCubed
Markiplier - https://www.youtube.com/user/markiplierGAME
PewDiePie - https://www.youtube.com/user/pewdiepie
BirgirPall - https://www.youtube.com/user/birgirpall
Toby Games - https://www.youtube.com/user/TobyGames
Captain Sparklez - https://www.youtube.com/user/CaptainSparklez
UberHaxorNova - https://www.youtube.com/user/UberHaxorNova
Grandpa Lemon - https://www.youtube.com/user/realannoyingorange

We wanted to include Robbaz and Cinnamontoastken in here, but they didn't fit into the edit. ARGH! We shall have to do something AWESOME to them, I mean, well. Something later. ;)
